trans-unit.source: Cannot copy folder "%s" into target folder "%s", because the target folder is already within the folder to be copied!
trans-unit.target: Невозможно скопировать папку "%s" в папку "%s", так как целевая папка уже содержит копируемую!

trans-unit.source: Cannot move folder "%s" into target folder "%s", because the target folder is already within the folder to be moved!
trans-unit.target: Невозможно переместить папку "%s" в папку "%s", так как целевая папка уже содержит перемещаемую!

trans-unit.source: Could not access all necessary resources. Source file or destination maybe was not within your mountpoints? T="%s", D="%s"
trans-unit.target: Нет доступа ко всем необходимым ресурсам. Возможно исходный файл или целевое место находится вне разрешённых точек доступа! T="%s", D="%s"

trans-unit.source: Could not delete directory! Is directory "%s" empty? (You are not allowed to delete directories recursively).
trans-unit.target: Невозможно удалить директорию! Пуста ли директория "%s"? (Недопустимо рекурсивно удалять директории).

trans-unit.source: Could not delete directory "%s"! There might be a problem with write permissions.
trans-unit.target: Невозможно удалить директорию "%s"! Возможны проблемы с правами на запись.

trans-unit.source: Could not delete file "%s". There might be a problem with write permissions.
trans-unit.target: Невозможно удалить файл "%s"! Возможны проблемы с правами на запись.

trans-unit.source: Destination "%s" already exists!
Destination path "%s" was not within your mountpoints!
trans-unit.target: Место назначения "%s" вне допустимых точек доступа!

trans-unit.source: Destination "%s" was not a directory.
Directory "%s" copied to "%s".
Directory "%s" created in "%s".
Directory "%s" moved to "%s".
Directory "%s" not created. There might be a problem with write permissions in "%s"?
trans-unit.target: Не создан каталог "%s". Возможно проблемы с доступом к "%s"?

trans-unit.source: Directory renamed from "%s" to "%s".
Directory "%s" was not renamed. (Same name as before)
Directory "%s" WAS NOT copied to "%s"! There might be a problem with write permissions
trans-unit.target: Каталог "%s" НЕ скопирован в "%s"! Возможно проблемы с правами на доступ.

trans-unit.source: Directory "%s" WAS NOT moved to "%s"! There might be a problem with write permissions
trans-unit.target: Каталог "%s" НЕ перемещён в "%s"! Возможно проблемы с правами на доступ.

trans-unit.source: Directory "%s" was not renamed! There might be a problem with write permissions in "%s"?
trans-unit.target: Каталог "%s" переименован! Возможно проблемы с правами на запись в "%s"?

trans-unit.source: Extension of file name "%s" is not allowed in "%s"!
trans-unit.target: Расширение или название файла "%s" недопустимо для "%s"!

trans-unit.source: Extension of file name "%s" or "%s" was not allowed!
trans-unit.target: Расширение в имени файла "%s" или "%s" недопустимо!

trans-unit.source: Extension of file "%s" was not allowed!
File "%s" already exists in folder "%s"!
File "%s" copied to "%s".
File created: "%s".
File existed already in "%s"!
File extension "%s" is not a textfile format! (%s).
trans-unit.target: Расширение файла "%s" не файл текстового формата! (%s).

trans-unit.source: File extension is not "zip".
File "%s" moved to "%s".
The file name "%s" is invalid, the file was automatically renamed to "%s".
File name "%s" was not allowed!
File "%s" or destination "%s" was not within your mountpoints!
trans-unit.target: Файл "%s" или место назначения "%s" вне допустимых точек доступа!

trans-unit.source: File or directory "%s" already exists!
File renamed from "%s" to "%s".
File "%s" was not renamed. (Same name as before)
trans-unit.target: Файл "%s" не переименован. (Всё осталось как и прежде)

trans-unit.source: File saved to "%s", bytes: %s, MD5: %s.
File "%s" WAS NOT copied to "%s"! There might be a problem with write permissions.
trans-unit.target: Файл "%s" НЕ скопирован в "%s"! Возможно проблемы с правами на запись.

trans-unit.source: File "%s" was not created! There might be a problem with write permissions in "%s"?
trans-unit.target: Файл "%s" не создан! Возможно проблемы с правами на запись в "%s"?

trans-unit.source: File "%s" was not renamed! There might be a problem with write permissions in "%s"?
trans-unit.target: Файл "%s" не переименовен! Возможно проблемы с правами на запись в "%s"?

trans-unit.source: File "%s" was not saved! There might be a problem with write permissions.
trans-unit.target: Файл "%s" не сохранён! Возможно проблемы с правами на запись.

trans-unit.source: File "%s" was not saved! File extension rejected!
Invalid folder name "%s"!
No file was uploaded!
No file was uploaded for replacing!
No name for new folder given!
trans-unit.target: Не задано название для новой папки!

trans-unit.source: No unique filename available in "%s"!
Replacing file "%s" to "%s".
Target "%s" already exists!
Target "%s" was not a file!
Target was not within your mountpoints! T="%s".
trans-unit.target: Цель вне допустимых точек доступа! T="%s".

trans-unit.source: The file "%s" did not exist!
The function to copy a file between storages is not yet implemented.
trans-unit.target: Функционал копирования между хранилищами ещё не реализован.

trans-unit.source: The function to copy a folder between storages is not yet implemented.
trans-unit.target: Функционал для копирования папок между хранилищами ещё не был реализован.

trans-unit.source: The function to move a file between storages is not yet implemented.
trans-unit.target: Функционал для перемещения файлов между хранилищами ещё не был реализован.

trans-unit.source: The function to move a folder between storages is not yet implemented.
trans-unit.target: Функционал для перемещения папок между хранилищами ещё не был реализован.

trans-unit.source: The uploaded file "%s" exceeds the size-limit
The upload has failed, no uploaded file found!
trans-unit.target: Ошибка загрузки, не найдено загружаемых файлов!

trans-unit.source: Unzipping file "%s" in "%s".
Uploaded file could not be moved! There might be a problem with write permissions in "%s"?
trans-unit.target: Загруженный файл невозможно переместить! Возможно проблемы с правами на запись в "%s"?

trans-unit.source: Uploading file "%s" to "%s".
You are not allowed to access the directory.
trans-unit.target: Вы не можете получить доступ к папке.

trans-unit.source: You are not allowed to access the file.
trans-unit.target: Вы не можете получить доступ к файлу.

trans-unit.source: You are not allowed to copy directories.
You are not allowed to copy files.
You are not allowed to create directories!
You are not allowed to create files!
You are not allowed to edit files!
You are not allowed to move directories.
You are not allowed to move files.
You are not allowed to override "%s"!
You are not allowed to rename directories!
You are not allowed to rename files!
You are not allowed to unzip files.
You are not allowed to upload files!
You don't have full access to the destination directory "%s"!
trans-unit.target: Нет полного доступа к каталогу назначения "%s"!
